alert.note: Alert for Dillon (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Robeson and north central Dillon Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raemon, or 10 miles south of Laurinburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pembroke, Fairmont, Rowland, Buie, Raemon, Purvis, Prospect, Elrod, South Of The Border, Mcdonald and Raynham. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
